name: Dogs on the Bed
description:
How to play

Left click = pick up/put down dog

A + D = Rotate dog

Aim of the game

Dont let your furry friends get too cold; keep them snuggly and warm in the bed.
 
Dogs that have been sleeping on the bed warm up and can be temporarily placed back on the floor (just dont let them get too cold).

Running out of space? You can stack certain dogs on top of each other (it also gets you more points).
  
Get as many points as possible, and aim to beat your high score! 

Get enough points to unlock a secret new dog. 

Let me know if you beat my current high score of 162!

Tips

Watch out for the smaller dogs they get colder faster 

Remember you can move dogs on and off the bed

You receive more points the higher you can stack the dog

Bigger dogs are also worth more points

The more blue a dog is the colder it's getting

Dogs warm up on the bed and can last longer on the floor

Info

This was created by a team of 2. 1 Programmer and 1 Artist. We finished with 7 hours to go out of the 72 hour time frame. Software used was Maya, Photoshop, Substance Painter, Audacity and Unity.
